title: Competitiveness, Constraints, & Coordination: A Strategy for Accelerating Energy Transition Investment in the Great ... - Rocky Mountain Institute
summary: The article discusses the investment boom in the energy transition sector, particularly in the Great Lakes region, driven by federal incentives and private investments. It highlights the region's focus on renewable energy, manufacturing capacity, job creation, and economic revitalization, emphasizing the need for coordination and strategic planning.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221114 (Solar Electric Power Generation), 336111 (Automobile Manufacturing), 325910 (Battery Manufacturing), 331110 (Iron and Steel Mills)
